overview: At the request of her uncle, Tak-yi, who has been managing the Youth Center for several months, is an aspiring priest.  Tak is constantly worried about the unidentified stray girl who wanders around him.  I don't want to meet him, but I feel sorry for him after seeing him get hungry and sleep on the road.  Tak decides to bring a girl into the house for a while to protect the girl who won't give her a room even in a shabby inn.  The girl seems to have been neglected on the street from a very young age. Tak-ni names the girl Kkot-nim and does her best as a guardian, but Kkom-nim begins to know what to do with Tak-i in order to eat the meat dish.
title: Werewolf Girl Educating Wild Girl
